00016   Expression* Listize::operator()(Selector_List* sel)
00017   {
00018     List* l = new (ctx.mem) List(sel->pstate(), sel->length(), List::COMMA);
00019     for (size_t i = 0, L = sel->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00020       *l << (*sel)[i]->perform(this);
00021     }
00022     return l;
00023   }

00025   Expression* Listize::operator()(Compound_Selector* sel)
00026   {
00027     To_String to_string;
00028     string str;
00029     for (size_t i = 0, L = sel->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00030       Expression* e = (*sel)[i]->perform(this);
00031       if (e) str += e->perform(&to_string);
00032     }
00033     return new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(sel->pstate(), str);
00034   }
00035 
00036   Expression* Listize::operator()(Complex_Selector* sel)
00037   {
00038     List* l = new (ctx.mem) List(sel->pstate(), 2);
00039 
00040     Compound_Selector* head = sel->head();
00041     if (head && !head->is_empty_reference())
00042     {
00043       Expression* hh = head->perform(this);
00044       if (hh) *l << hh;
00045     }
00046 
00047     switch(sel->combinator())
00048     {
00049       case Complex_Selector::PARENT_OF:
00050         *l << new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(sel->pstate(), ">");
00051       break;
00052       case Complex_Selector::ADJACENT_TO:
00053         *l << new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(sel->pstate(), "+");
00054       break;
00055       case Complex_Selector::PRECEDES:
00056         *l << new (ctx.mem) String_Constant(sel->pstate(), "~");
00057       break;
00058       case Complex_Selector::ANCESTOR_OF:
00059       break;
00060     }
00061 
00062     Complex_Selector* tail = sel->tail();
00063     if (tail)
00064     {
00065       Expression* tt = tail->perform(this);
00066       if (tt && tt->concrete_type() == Expression::LIST)
00067       { *l += static_cast<List*>(tt); }
00068       else if (tt) *l << static_cast<List*>(tt);
00069     }
00070     if (l->length() == 0) return 0;
00071     return l;
00072   }

00076     return 0;

00079   Expression* Listize::fallback_impl(AST_Node* n)
00080   {
00081     return static_cast<Expression*>(n);
